stack:stack.stack:description:
These scripts are executed after AutoYaST has completed the system configuration and after it has booted the system for the first time.
These scripts only work SLES 11 and SLES 12 backend nodes -- they *don't* work on CasSP backend nodes.

stack:stack.stack:script:
&hostname; &hostname; &hostname;
# # the above command (report host resolv) writes /etc/resolv.conf. make sure # YaST doesn't overwrite it #
awk '/NETCONFIG_DNS_POLICY/ { \ printf("NETCONFIG_DNS_POLICY=\"\"\n"); \ next; \ } \ { print $0 }' /etc/sysconfig/network/config > /tmp/config
cp /tmp/config /etc/sysconfig/network/config
file = open('/root/.ssh/id_rsa.pub') for line in file.readlines(): print(line.strip())
chmod a+rx /root chmod a+rx /root/.ssh
